long_description: When the temperature falls and walks in the woods with your favorite 4-legged friend beckon, slip on the prAna Carter Jacket for men and enjoy the warmth of its fleece lining. Polyester fleece lines the collar and body for soft warmth. Sturdy nylon oxford canvas features a durable water repellent finish that sheds light rain or snow. Stormflap over center-front zipper delivers extra weather protection. The men's prAna Carter Jacket features welted zippered hand pockets, a welted chest pocket, an interior stash pocket and a patch chest pocket.
short_description: When the temperature falls and walks in the woods with your favorite 4-legged friend beckon, slip on the prAna Carter Jacket for men and enjoy the warmth of its fleece lining.
